item.title: Deobfuscating Wordpress Malware
item.description: While browsing a friends website, I recognized malicious popups that opened up. It was hard to reproduce, because they showed up quite rarely and my friend never noticed them. Fortunately, I could convince her to have a look into her website by myself so I could analyze it and try to gain security.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a computer science student with a special interest in privacy and security topics, as well as computer networking.
